DOC.brief_summary: In rural Nepal , major driver underutilization skilled birth attendance poverty , poor social support inadequate birth planning . Drawing similar program show improve maternal neonatal outcome , design group antenatal care program use participatory learn action process engage woman identify solve problem access maternity care service create supportive social network . We plan test group antenatal care program change antenatal care three major way : 1 ) conduct care group set woman match gestational age , 2 ) incorporate participatory learn action , 3 ) provide expert facilitate peer counseling .
DOC.brief_title: Group Antenatal Care : The Power Peers Increasing Skilled Birth Attendance Achham , Nepal
DOC.detailed_description: The group antenatal care intervention aim improve rate institutional birth ANC care completion via improve acceptability group care , maternal neonatal health knowledge , self-efficacy , social support , birth planning . Objective 1 : Assess effect group antenatal care institutional birth rate prospective study use community household census data . Secondary outcome completion basic ANC package ; neonatal mortality rate ; percentage preterm birth ; percentage stillbirth ; percentage small-for-gestational age ( SGA ) birth . - Hypothesis 1 : Group ANC increase institutional birth rate 25 % one year . - Hypothesis 2 : Group ANC increase completion 4 ANC visit 25 % one year . - Hypothesis 3 : Group ANC reduce neonatal mortality rate 25 % one year . - Hypothesis 4 : Group ANC reduce percentage preterm birth 25 % one year . - Hypothesis 5 : Group ANC reduce percentage stillbirth 25 % one year . - Hypothesis 6 : Group ANC reduce percentage SGA birth 25 % one year . Objective 2 : Assess mechanism implementation group antenatal care quantitative participant survey measure , qualitative focus group discussion key informant interview . - Hypothesis 1 : Group antenatal care acceptable participant provider , prefer individual care . - Hypothesis 2 : Group antenatal care increase pregnant patient ' access utilization delivery service improve knowledge , self-efficacy , social support birth planning . Objective 3 : Report key aspect implementation process : cost , human resource , logistics , fidelity group antenatal program model content participatory process .
DOC.criteria: Female Age 1549 year old Resident 14 village cluster study site Intervention cohort : le 24 week ' gestation prior first group antenatal care session . Intervention cohort : 24 week ' gestation prior first group antenatal care session .
